sense.gloss: to shout, to cry (out), to yell, to scream, to clamour

sdata.j: |わめく|のをやめて、お↑願↑↓ねが↓いだから。
そんなに↑耳元↑↓みみもと↓でギャーギャー|わめく|なよ。
sdata.e: Don't shriek in my ear like that!

sdata.j: ↑終↑↓お↓わらない↑終↑↓お↓わらないって、わーわー|わめく|↑暇↑↓ひま↓があったら↑黙↑↓だま↓ってやればいいのに。
sdata.e: If you have the time to be whining about how it's never going to be over, then you should be able to just shut up and do it.
